text.english: Theorem: app is associative, i.e. \[ \forall l1,l2,l3 \in L_{\mathbb N} . app (app (l1,l2), l3) = app (l1, app (l2, l3)) \]
text.italiano: Teorema: app e' associativa, i.e. \[ \forall l1,l2,l3 \in L_{\mathbb N} . app (app (l1,l2), l3) = app (l1, app (l2, l3)) \]

theorem.coq: Theorem mapp_app : forall (l1 l2 l3 : list nat) , app ( app l1 l2) l3 = app l1 (app l2 l3).
